properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Port Aransas to Matagorda Ship Channel out 20 NM; Waters from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas out 20 NM; Waters from Port Aransas to Matagorda Ship Channel from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 19 at 10:55PM CST until February 20 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, north winds 20 to 25
knots with gusts up to 34 knots and seas 5 to 8 feet expected.
For the Gale Watch, northeast winds 20 to 30 knots with gusts
up to 40 knots and seas 6 to 11 feet possible.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas out 20
NM, Coastal waters from Port Aransas to Matagorda Ship Channel
out 20 NM, Waters from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas from 20 to
60 NM and Waters from Port Aransas to Matagorda Ship Channel
from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 9 AM to 3 PM CST
Thursday. For the Gale Watch, from Thursday afternoon through
late Thursday night.

* IMPACTS...Gale force winds and high seas will result in
dangerous marine conditions which could result in capsized or
damaged vessels.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 3 PM CST THURSDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT
